UserCalendarListController.label: User Calendars
UserCalendarListController.description: Certain services can support personal calendars. If you use an authentication service that has personal calendars, you can use it in the calendar module.

ResourceListController.label: Resource Calendars
ResourceListController.description: Certain services can support shared resource calendars. If you use an authentication service that has resources, you can use it in the calendar module.

BASE_URL.label: URL
BASE_URL.description: The url for the feed or web service

CACHE_LIFETIME.label: Cache lifetime
CACHE_LIFETIME.description: The length of time to cache the feed from the server

PARSER_CLASS.label: Parser Class
PARSER_CLASS.description: The class used to parse calendar data. Rarely needs to be changed

EVENT_CLASS.label: Event Class
EVENT_CLASS.description: The class used to parse calendar events. Rarely needs to be changed
